reviewText: Best movie trio ever! Yea Billy Crystal. DVD was in perfect condition.

Billy Crystal is Great !
Excellent trio
I like these movies they were so much fun to watch especially seeing Robin Williams!
love the movies and that all three were together !
love it and will watch it over and over. Billy's movies are always entertaining and so glad I got this for the family.
I bought this 3 movie pack as a gift for my grand daughter. She loves these type movies. Try it for yourself.
This DVD is such a good value: 3 classic films with Billy Crystal (Forget Paris is what I was originally looking for, but got so much more) plus it saves space in my DVD collection. Genius

#1. Great love story with humor, of course.
#2. A strange story of two, very different men, pursuing ,who they each think, is their runaway son.
#3. A fun fantasy.
Great package, though I don't see Robin as the primary player.
3 movies in one, very funny and entertaining!
I got this for a good price. I've watched Father's Day, it was pretty funny.
Nice - works gr8 and arrived quickly
A gift well received,Thank you.:)
Love these movies. Purchase came FaST! Have watched them all alone & with grandkids, multiple times! So worth the pennies spent!!!
